code: export default{home:function home(){return fetch('http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/home').then(function(res){return res.json();});},register:function register(data,slug){var token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));return fetch("http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/course-register/".concat(slug),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token.accessToken)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},detail:function detail(slug){return fetch("http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/course/".concat(slug)).then(function(res){return res.json();});},related:function related(slug){return fetch("http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/course-related/".concat(slug)).then(function(res){return res.json();});}};
